Package org.openpnp.spi

Interface MovableMountable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Locatable, Movable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Actuator, Camera, HeadMountable, Nozzle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActuator, AbstractBroadcastingCamera, AbstractCamera, AbstractHeadMountable, AbstractNozzle, AbstractSettlingCamera, BufferedImageCamera, ContactProbeNozzle, GstreamerCamera, HttpActuator, ImageCamera, MjpgCaptureCamera, Neoden4Camera, NeoDen4FeederActuator, Neoden4SwitcherCamera, OnvifIPCamera, OpenCvCamera, OpenPnpCaptureCamera, ReferenceActuator, ReferenceCamera, ReferenceNozzle, ScriptActuator, SimulatedUpCamera, SwitcherCamera, ThermistorToLinearSensorActuator, Webcams
    public interface MovableMountable
extends Movable
    Anything that can be mounted to the machine and is Movable has its mapped Axes.

      • toTransformed

        Location toTransformed​(AxesLocation location,
                       Locatable.LocationOption... options)
        Converts the specified raw motion-controller AxesLocation into a transformed Head Location. Note, toTransformed() must not throw even if transformations are not well-defined. This would otherwise disrupt operation while setting the machine up. Only if toRaw() will throw, e.g. when you want to move the machine.
        Parameters:
        location -
        options -
        Returns:

      • toRaw

        AxesLocation toRaw​(Location location,
                   Locatable.LocationOption... options)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Converts the specified transformed Head Location into a raw motion-controller AxesLocation. Note, unlike toTransformed() toRaw() will throw if the reverse transformation is not well-defined. As this typically happens when trying to move the machine, it is an appropriately graded precaution.
        Parameters:
        location -
        options -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
